description_zh: 基于Radix UI和Tailwind CSS构建的可重用组件
description_en: Re-usable components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS
submitRequirements_zh: 需要提供详细的组件建议或bug报告，遵循贡献指南
submitRequirements_en: Detailed component suggestions or bug reports required, following contribution guidelines
rating_zh: 基于Radix UI和Tailwind CSS构建的高质量组件库，提供了可复制粘贴的组件代码，设计精美，可访问性好，是React项目的优秀选择。
rating_en: High-quality component library built on Radix UI and Tailwind CSS, providing copy-paste component code with beautiful design and good accessibility, an excellent choice for React projects.
